author: RTÉ News
title: Belfast City Hospital tower earmarked for virus surge
description: The tower block at Belfast City Hospital will be set aside for 230 coronavirus patients, Stormont's Department of Health has said.
content:
The tower block at Belfast City Hospital will be set aside for 230 coronavirus patients, Stormont's Department of Health has said.
Critical care capacity will also be boosted at the Ulster Hospital in Co Down and Altnagelvin in Derry.
